3 int main(int argc, char** argv)
4 {
5  ros::init(argc, argv, "TX2_unicornStatemachine");
6  StateMachine * state_machine = new StateMachine();
7  int exit_code = state_machine->start();
8  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN] State machine exited with: %d", exit_code);
9  return 0;
10 }

12 bool StateMachine::areRIONodesRunning(ros::V_string nodes)
13 {
14  std::vector<std::string> RIO_node_names = {"/RIO_publisher", "/RIO_unicornStateSubscriber", "/RIO_ledSubscriber"};
15  return std::includes(nodes.begin(), nodes.end(), RIO_node_names.begin(), RIO_node_names.end());
16 }
17 
18 bool StateMachine::checkROSNodeStatus()
19 {
20  ros::V_string nodes;
21  ros::master::getNodes(nodes);
22  ros::Rate rate(0.5);
23  while(!areRIONodesRunning(nodes))
24  {
25  if(!ros::master::getNodes(nodes) || !ros::master::check())
26  {
27  ROS_ERROR("[UNICORN State Machine] ROS status check: Could not fetch nodes from master");
28  return false;
29  }
30  ros::spinOnce();
31  rate.sleep();
32  }
33  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] ROS status check: OK");
34  return true;
35 }
36 
37 StateMachine::StateMachine()
38 {
39  bool run_global_loc, sim_time;
40  std::string odom_topic;
41  /*Extract params specified in the launch file*/
42  if (!n_.getParam("use_sim_time", sim_time))
43  {
44  sim_time = false;
45  }
46  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] sim_time: %i", sim_time);
47 
48  if (!n_.getParam("max_angular_vel", max_angular_vel_))
49  {
50  max_angular_vel_ = 0.5;
51  }
52  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] MAX_ANGULAR_VEL: %f", max_angular_vel_);
53  if (!n_.getParam("max_linear_vel", max_linear_vel_))
54  {
55  max_linear_vel_ = 0.3;
56  }
57  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] MAX_LINEAR_VEL: %f", max_linear_vel_);
58  if (!n_.getParam("odometry_topic", odom_topic))
59  {
60  odom_topic = "odom";
61  }
62  if (!n_.getParam("frame_id", frame_id_))
63  {
64  frame_id_ = "base_link";
65  }
66 
67  if(!n_.getParam("global_local", run_global_loc))
68  {
69  run_global_loc = false;
70  }
71  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Robot frame_id: %s", frame_id_.c_str());
72  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Listening to %s", odom_topic.c_str());
73 
74  /*Setup ROS subscribers and publishers*/
75  state_pub_ = n_.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/TX2_unicorn_state", 0);
76  amcl_global_clt_ = n_.serviceClient<std_srvs::Empty>("/global_localization");
77  cmd_vel_pub_ = n_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/unicorn/cmd_vel", 0);
78  odom_sub_ = n_.subscribe(odom_topic.c_str(), 0, &StateMachine::odomCallback, this);
79  cmd_sub_ = n_.subscribe(command_topic_, 0, &StateMachine::cmdCallback, this);
80 
81  /*Init global localisation if param is set*/
82  if (run_global_loc)
83  {
84  initGlobalLocalisation();
85  }
86 
87  /*Create pid controller for x movement*/
88  velocity_pid_ = new PidController(0.3, 0.1, 0.0, 0.05);
89  velocity_pid_->setLimit(-0.3, 0.3);
90 
91  /*Refuse bin location*/
92  refuse_bin_pose_.x = 0;
93  refuse_bin_pose_.y = 0;
94  refuse_bin_pose_.yaw = 0;
95 
96  /*Set the current state to be IDLE*/
97  Command initial_cmd;
98  initial_cmd.state = STATE_IDLE;
99  current_state_ = StateFactory::CreateStateInstance(initial_cmd, n_, refuse_bin_pose_);
100 }
101 
102 StateMachine::~StateMachine() {
103  delete velocity_pid_;
104 }
105 
106 int StateMachine::start()
107 {
108  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Check ROS Status...");
109  if(!checkROSNodeStatus())
110  {
111  return -1;
112  }
113  Command new_cmd;
114  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Starting state machine...");
115  while (ros::ok())
116  {
117  updateAndPublishState(current_state_->state_identifier_);
118  new_cmd = current_state_->run();
119  current_state_.reset();
120  current_state_ = StateFactory::CreateStateInstance(new_cmd, n_, refuse_bin_pose_);
121  }
122  return 1;
123 }
124 
125 void StateMachine::initGlobalLocalisation()
126 {
127  std_srvs::Empty srv;
128  ros::service::waitForService("/global_localization", 1);
129 
130  if (amcl_global_clt_.call(srv))
131  {
132  ROS_INFO("[AM Unicorn Interface]: Initialized amcl global localization");
133  }
134  else
135  {
136  ROS_ERROR("[AM Unicorn Interface]: Failed to initialize amcl global localization");
137  }
138 }
139 
140 void StateMachine::cmdCallback(const unicorn::command &msg)
141 {
142  ROS_INFO("[Unicorn State Machine]: New command has been received");
143  Command new_cmd;
144  new_cmd.state = msg.state;
145  new_cmd.param1 = msg.param1;
146  new_cmd.param2 = msg.param2;
147  new_cmd.param3 = msg.param3;
148  current_state_->setNewCmd(new_cmd);
149  return;
150 }
151 
152 void StateMachine::odomCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry &msg)
153 {
154  tf::Pose pose;
155  tf::poseMsgToTF(msg.pose.pose, pose);
156  current_yaw_ = tf::getYaw(pose.getRotation());
157  current_vel_ = msg.twist.twist.linear.x;
158  return;
159 }
160 
161 void StateMachine::updateAndPublishState(int new_state)
162 {
163  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine]: Updating state to: %d", new_state);
164  std_msgs::Int32 new_state_msg;
165  new_state_msg.data = new_state;
166  state_pub_.publish(new_state_msg);
167  return;
168 }
